@graph.name: Greek Pasta Salad
@graph.description: This easy Greek pasta salad is perfect for BBQs and picnics! It's fresh, easy to make, healthy, and vegan. The perfect recipe to make for your next party!
recipeIngredient: 2 cups cherry tomatoes, cut into halves
3/4  English cucumber, cut into quartered pieces
6  artichoke hearts in brine, drained and roughly chopped ((1 14 oz can))
3 tablespoons balsamic vinegar or red wine vinegar

recipeInstructions.text: First, make the vegan feta cheese: The night before making the salad, cut the tofu into small cubes. In a small bowl, combine all of the ingredients for the marinade. Fill the tofu and the marinade into a ziploc bag and store it overnight in the fridge. If you don't have much time, you could also get away with marinating it for about 4 hours. But it's definitely better if you marinate it for a longer time. Also make sure that you got a very firm tofu. It makes the best texture!
recipeInstructions.name: First, make the vegan feta cheese: The night before making the salad, cut the tofu into small cubes. In a small bowl, combine all of the ingredients for the marinade. Fill the tofu and the marinade into a ziploc bag and store it overnight in the fridge. If you don't have much time, you could also get away with marinating it for about 4 hours. But it's definitely better if you marinate it for a longer time. Also make sure that you got a very firm tofu. It makes the best texture!

recipeInstructions.text: Cook the pasta according to the instructions on the package. Set aside and let it cool down a bit (not completely). Chop the remaining ingredients and make the dressing.
recipeInstructions.name: Cook the pasta according to the instructions on the package. Set aside and let it cool down a bit (not completely). Chop the remaining ingredients and make the dressing.

recipeInstructions.text: In a large bowl, combine all ingredients for the pasta salad including the vegan feta. Add the dressing and toss.
recipeInstructions.name: In a large bowl, combine all ingredients for the pasta salad including the vegan feta. Add the dressing and toss.

recipeInstructions.text: Refrigerate for at least 2-3 hours before serving.
recipeInstructions.name: Refrigerate for at least 2-3 hours before serving.
